headline.main: AFFAIRS AT FORTRESS MONROE.; ARRIVAL OF MORE NEW-YORK TROOPS. NEWS FROM THE FORTRESS IN DETAIL. From the Baltimore Clipper of yesterday. LETTER FROM FORTRESS MONROE.
